Model

类 Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows the creation of Risk player objects.
    作者:
    yaomeng

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void addContinent(Continent continent)
      When a player occupies all the countries on a continent the continent must be added to a data structure that tracks which continents the player occupies.
      void addCountry(java.util.ArrayList<Country> countriesList)
      Works like addCountry above, but can be used to add multiple countries at once.
      void addCountry(Country country)
      When a player conquers a country the country needs to be added to a data structure that keeps track of all the countries the player occupies.
      void addRiskCard(Card riskCard)
      Adds a risk card to the players hand.
      void decrementArmies(int numArmies)
      Decreases the count of the number of numArmies the player has on the board This count has to reflect the actual number of numArmies the players has on the board.
      int getArmies()
      Gets the armies.
      java.util.ArrayList<Card> getHand()
      Gets the hand.
      Hand getHandObject()
      Gets the hand object.
      int getIndex()
      Gets the index.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Gets the name.
      java.util.ArrayList<Country> getOwnedCountries()
      Gets the owned countries.
      int getTurnInCount()
      Gets the turn in count.
      void incrementArmies(int numArmies)
      Increases the count of the number of numArmies the player has on the board This count has to reflect the actual number of numArmies the players has on the board.
      boolean mustTurnInCards()
      Must turn in cards.
      void removeCards(int[] cardsTurnedInIndex)
      Removed a set of risk cards from the players hand to reflect risk cards being turned in.
      void removeContinent(java.lang.String continentName)
      Removes a continent from the data structure to reflect that the player no longer controls the whole continent.
      void removeCountry(java.lang.String countryName)
      When a player loses a country, the country must be removed from the data structure tracking which countries the player occupies.

      • decrementArmies

        public void decrementArmies(int numArmies)
        Decreases the count of the number of numArmies the player has on the board This count has to reflect the actual number of numArmies the players has on the board.
        参数:
        numArmies - the num armies

      • incrementArmies

        public void incrementArmies(int numArmies)
        Increases the count of the number of numArmies the player has on the board This count has to reflect the actual number of numArmies the players has on the board.
        参数:
        numArmies - the num armies

      • addCountry

        public void addCountry(Country country)
        When a player conquers a country the country needs to be added to a data structure that keeps track of all the countries the player occupies.
        参数:
        country - the country

      • addCountry

        public void addCountry(java.util.ArrayList<Country> countriesList)
        Works like addCountry above, but can be used to add multiple countries at once.
        参数:
        countriesList - the countries list

      • removeCountry

        public void removeCountry(java.lang.String countryName)
        When a player loses a country, the country must be removed from the data structure tracking which countries the player occupies.
        参数:
        countryName - the country name

      • addContinent

        public void addContinent(Continent continent)
        When a player occupies all the countries on a continent the continent must be added to a data structure that tracks which continents the player occupies.
        参数:
        continent - the continent

      • removeContinent

        public void removeContinent(java.lang.String continentName)
        Removes a continent from the data structure to reflect that the player no longer controls the whole continent.
        参数:
        continentName - the continent name

      • addRiskCard

        public void addRiskCard(Card riskCard)
        Adds a risk card to the players hand.
        参数:
        riskCard - the risk card

      • removeCards

        public void removeCards(int[] cardsTurnedInIndex)
        Removed a set of risk cards from the players hand to reflect risk cards being turned in.
        参数:
        cardsTurnedInIndex - the cards turned in index
